title: The Koala. - Rev ed.
creator_credit: John Shaw, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: This film looks at the biological characteristics of the koala and the various types which are determined by its climatic region in Eastern Australia. Those features which make the koala peculiarly adaptable to its territorial environment are described and its life cycle is surveyed. A shorter, revised version of T/Code 005919.
